main event: Three objects were observed on radar in Uruguay on December 7, 1958.
interesting points: The report is from a private organization in Uruguay called CIOVT (Centro de Investigacion de Objetos Voladores Identificados or Center for the Investigation of Identified Flying Objects).
The observer is described as one of CIOVT's best members.
The objects exhibited unusual maneuvers and emitted a whitish-blue light before disappearing.
The observer concluded the objects were controlled and guided, not inert objects affected by gravity.
CIOVT considers the report to be authentic testimony.
sighted object: three unidentified objects tracked on radar
